author: @powersang6114
text: In case some of you cannot read the text file by your editor, it may due to the  QtGui.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, 'Open File') returns a tuple of 2 elements: name = QtGui.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, 'Open File') return (u'C:/Users/username/filename.sth', u'All Files (*.*)') so you may change the line  file = open(name, 'r')  to  file = open(name[0], 'r')  This should work. I am using python 2.7

text: in Qt5, you have to do it this way： 「name, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, "Open File")」
